format.full-description: This MHS 1B description was generated using the MHS PFS Excel document Issue 6 Revision 5 (eps_mhsl1_6.5_names_masks.xls) and pfs2xml version 3.2

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_1
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_2
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_3
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_4
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

item.name: All NOAA
item.description: instruments specific to Level 0 NOAA product
NOAC Global Area Coverage AVHRR data
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at full resolution
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at operational resolution (50 km)
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at research resolution (25 km)

field.name: SENSING_START
field.description: UTC Time of start of sensing data in this object (PDU, ROI or Full Product)

field.name: SENSING_END
field.description: UTC Time of end of sensing data in this object (PDU, ROI or Full Product)

field.name: SENSING_START_THEORETICAL
field.description: Theoretical UTC Time of start of sensing data in the dump from which this object is derived. This data is the predicted start time at the MPF level.

field.name: SENSING_END_THEORETICAL
field.description: Theoretical UTC Time of end of sensing data in the dump from which this object is derived. This data is the predicted end time at the MPF level.

item.description: First EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment
Second EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment
Third EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment

field.name: PROCESSING_TIME_START
field.description: UTC time of the processing at start of processing for the product

field.name: PROCESSING_TIME_END
field.description: UTC time of the processing at end of processing for the product

field.name: PROCESSING_MODE
field.description: Identification of the mode of processing

item.description: SOCC (NESDIS Satellite Operations Control Centre), Suitland, Maryland

field.name: RECEIVE_TIME_START
field.description: UTC time of the reception at CDA for first Data Item

field.name: RECEIVE_TIME_END
field.description: UTC time of the reception at CDA for last Data Item

field.name: ORBIT_START
field.description: Start Orbit Number, counted incrementally since launch

field.name: STATE_VECTOR_TIME
field.description: Epoch time (in UTC) of the orbital elements and the orbit state vector. this corresponds to the time of crossing the ascending node for ORBIT_START

field.name: SEMI_MAJOR_AXIS
field.description: Semi major axis of orbit at time of the ascending node crossing.

field.name: ECCENTRICITY
field.description: Orbit eccentricity at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: INCLINATION
field.description: Orbit inclination at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: PERIGEE_ARGUMENT
field.description: Argument of perigee at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: RIGHT_ASCENSION
field.description: Right ascension at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: MEAN_ANOMALY
field.description: Mean anomaly at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: X_POSITION
field.description: X position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Y_POSITION
field.description: Y position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Z_POSITION
field.description: Z position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: X_VELOCITY
field.description: X velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Y_VELOCITY
field.description: Y velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Z_VELOCITY
field.description: Z velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: EARTH_SUN_DISTANCE_RATIO
field.description: Earth-Sun distance ratio - ratio of current Eart-Sun distance to Mean Earth-Sun distance

field.name: SUBSAT_LATITUDE_START
field.description: Latitude of sub-satellite point at start of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LONGITUDE_START
field.description: Longitude of sub-satellite point at start of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LATITUDE_END
field.description: Latitude of sub-satellite point at end of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LONGITUDE_END
field.description: Longitude of sub-satellite point at end of the data set

field.name: LEAP_SECOND
field.description: Occurence of Leap second within the product. Field is set to -1, 0 or +1 dependent upon occurrence of leap second and direction.

field.name: LEAP_SECOND_UTC
field.description: UTC time of occurrence of the Leap Second (If no leap second in the product, value is null)

field.name: TOTAL_RECORDS
field.description: Total count of all records in the product

field.name: TOTAL_MPHR
field.description: Total count of all MPHRs in product (should always be 1!)

field.name: TOTAL_SPHR
field.description: Total count of all SPHRs in product (should be 0 or 1 only)

field.name: TOTAL_IPR
field.description: Total count of all IPRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_GEADR
field.description: Total count of all GEADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_GIADR
field.description: Total count of all GIADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_VEADR
field.description: Total count of all VEADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_VIADR
field.description: Total count of all VIADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_MDR
field.description: Total count of all MDRs in the product

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_INST_MDR
field.description: Count of MDRs with degradation due to instrument problems

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_PROC_MDR
field.description: Count of MDRs with degradation due to processing problems

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_INST_MDR_BLOCKS
field.description: Count of the number of blocks of MDRs degraded due to degraded instrument

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_PROC_MDR_BLOCKS
field.description: Count of the number of blocks of MDRs degraded due to degraded processing

field.name: DURATION_OF_PRODUCT
field.description: The duration of the product in milliseconds

field.name: MILLISECONDS_OF_DATA_PRESENT
field.description: The total amount of data present in the product

field.name: MILLISECONDS_OF_DATA_MISSING
field.description: The total amount of data missing from the prodcut

field.name: SUBSETTED_PRODUCT
field.description: Set when product has been subsetted (e.g. geographically subsetted using a region of interest filter). Implies the presence of one or more UMARF GIADRs in GAD section for product retrieved from UMARF.

field.name: MID_PIX_POSITION_ZERO
field.description: Zero Mid Pixel Position equivalent 0 deg = centre of OBCT 180 deg = nadir
tabulated mispointing data for each pixel - out of scan plane errors for 91 positions Earth pixel 1-90 and 118 -5 channels
tabulated mispointing data for each pixel - in scan plane errors for 91 Boresight angles - 5 channels

field.name: IDEAL_POINTING_ANGLE
field.description: Ideal pointing spacing between two pixels for MHS (nominal 1.11111 deg.)
Reference Resistances for the primary PRT Set (Three channels)
PRT weighting coefficients (1 = PRT ok, 0 = bad PRT, 2 = Central PRT ok)
Reference Resistances for the secondary PRT Set
PRT weighting coefficients (1 = PRT ok, 0 = bad PRT, 2 = Central PRT ok)

field.name: INST_TEMPERATURE_SENSOR_ID
field.description: Instrument sensor ID; 0=primary (H5 LO temperature [QBS5]), 1=backup (H1 LO temperature [QBS1])
Primary reference temperatures (from QBS5, minimum,nominal,and maximum)
Backup reference temperatures (from QBS1, minimum,nominal,and maximum)
Cold Space Bias correction term, due to spacecraft and limb contamination (5 channels, 3 profiles)
Warm load correction term, (5 channels, 3 instrument temperatures [minimum, nominal, maximum])
a(n), scan dependent non linearity parameter at instrument temperature T1 (minimum temperature)
a(n), scan dependent non linearity parameter at instrument temperature T2 (nominal temperature)
a(n), scan dependent non linearity parameter at instrument temperature T3 (maximum temperature)
a(n), scan dependent non linearity parameter at instrument backup temperature T1 (minimum temperature)
a(n), scan dependent non linearity parameter at instrument backup temperature T2 (nominal temperature)
a(n), scan dependent non linearity parameter at backup instrument temperature T3 (maximum temperature)

field.name: TEMPERATURE_H1_INTERCEPT
field.description: Intercept for band correction channel H1

field.name: TEMPERATURE_H1_SLOPE
field.description: Slope for band correction channel H1

field.name: TEMPERATURE_H2_INTERCEPT
field.description: Intercept for band correction channel H2

field.name: TEMPERATURE_H2_SLOPE
field.description: Slope for band correction channel H2

field.name: TEMPERATURE_H3_INTERCEPT
field.description: Intercept for band correction channel H3

field.name: TEMPERATURE_H3_SLOPE
field.description: Slope for band correction channel H3

field.name: TEMPERATURE_H4_INTERCEPT
field.description: Intercept for band correction channel H4

field.name: TEMPERATURE_H4_SLOPE
field.description: Slope for band correction channel H4

field.name: TEMPERATURE_H5_INTERCEPT
field.description: Intercept for band correction channel H5

field.name: TEMPERATURE_H5_SLOPE
field.description: Slope for band correction channel H5

giadr.name: giadr-adconv
giadr.description: Conversion Coefficients for the Digital Telemetry

field.name: THERM_TEMP_C0
field.description: Zeroth order coefficient for conversion of the 24 housekeeping thermistors

field.name: THERM_TEMP_C1
field.description: First order coefficient for conversion of the 24 housekeeping thermistors

field.name: THERM_TEMP_C2
field.description: Second order coefficient for conversion of the 24 housekeeping thermistors

field.name: THERM_TEMP_C3
field.description: Third order coefficient for conversion of the 24 housekeeping thermistors

field.name: THERM_TEMP_C4
field.description: Fourth order coefficient for conversion of the 24 housekeeping thermistors

field.name: SURVIVAL_TEMPERATURE_C0
field.description: Zeroth order coefficient for Volt-to-temperature conversion of the survival thermistors

field.name: SURVIVAL_TEMPERATURE_C1
field.description: First order coefficient for Volt-to-temperature conversion of the survival thermistors

field.name: SURVIVAL_TEMPERATURE_C2
field.description: Second order coefficient for Volt-to-temperature conversion of the survival thermistors

field.name: SURVIVAL_TEMPERATURE_C3
field.description: Third order coefficient for Volt-to-temperature conversion of the survival thermistors

field.name: SURVIVAL_TEMPERATURE_C4
field.description: Fourth order coefficient for Volt-to-temperature conversion of the survival thermistors

field.name: SURVIVAL_TEMPERATURE_C5
field.description: Fifth order coefficient for Volt-to-temperature conversion of the survival thermistors

field.name: ANTENNA_POSITION_CONVERSION
field.description: Conversion factor for converting antenna views in degrees (default value=7.2/1024 degrees/count)
Bias correction values depending on channel, scan angle, and transmitter (see text)
New bias correction values for three cycles of 8 seconds each (see text)

field.name: DEGRADED_INST_MDR
field.description: Quality of MDR has been degraded from nominal due to an instrument degradation

field.name: DEGRADED_PROC_MDR
field.description: Quality of MDR has been degraded from nominal due to a processing degradation

field.name: UTC_SL_TIME_DAY
field.description: UTC SL Time (# of days w.r.t. 171/2000 (day 0))

bit.name: Undefined
bit.description: Bits not defined

bit.name: mode code
bit.description: Power-on: 0000, Warm-up: 0001, Standby: 0010, Scan: 0011, Fixed-view: 0100, Self-test: 0101, Safeing: 0110, Fault: 0111, Unused: 1000 and 1110, Memory Data Packet ID: 1111

bit.name: PIE ID
bit.description: 0: PIE A, 1: PIE B

bit.name: sub-commutation code
bit.description: indicates which set of thermistor telemetry data is included in this scan

bit.name: TC Clean
bit.description: SD4:1 TC Clean (set to 1 if a parity or checksum is not found in the packet)

bit.name: TC Conforms
bit.description: SD4:2 TC Conforms (Set to 1 if the header of the received command conforms to CCSDS format)

bit.name: TC recognised flag
bit.description: SD4:3 TC recognised flag (Set to 1 if received command is recognised MHS command)

bit.name: TC Legal flag
bit.description: SD4:4 TC Legal flag (set if received command is legal for execution in the current MHS operation mode)

bit.name: FDM Motor current Trip Status
bit.description: SD5:9 FDM Motor current Trip Status

bit.name: TC Application ID
bit.description: SD4:5 TC Application ID

bit.name: TC Packet Sequence ID count
bit.description: SD4:6 TC Packet Sequence ID count

bit.name: TC Received count
bit.description: SD4:7 TC Received count

bit.name: Current Monitor Fault
bit.description: SD5:1 Current Monitor Fault

bit.name: Thermistor Monitor Fault
bit.description: SD5:2 Thermistor Monitor Fault

bit.name: Switch fault
bit.description: SD5:3 Switch fault

bit.name: Processor Fault
bit.description: SD5:4 Processor Fault

bit.name: RDM Motor Current Trip Status
bit.description: SD5:8 RDM Motor Current Trip Status

bit.name: DC Offset Error
bit.description: SD5:5 DC Offset Error

bit.name: Scan Control Error
bit.description: SD5:6 Scan Control Error

bit.name: REF ck Error
bit.description: SD5:7 REF ck Error
Receiver channel H4 backend (0=off,1=on)
Receiver channel H3 backend (0=off,1=on)
Receiver channel H3/H4 local oscillator (0=A,1=B)
Receiver channel H3/H4 front-end (0=off,1=on)
Receiver channel H2 local oscillator (0=A,1=B)
Receiver channel H2 (0=off,1=on)
Receiver channel H1 local oscillator (0=A,1=B)
Receiver channel H1 (0=off,1=on)
PROM (1=a PROM segment switch has failed ON)
Signal processing electronics/scan control electronics (0=off, 1=on)
Auxiliary operational heaters (0=off, 1=on)
Scan mechanism operational heaters(0=off, 1=on)
Receiver operational heaters (0=off, 1=on)
Rx CV (0=off, 1=on)
Receiver channel H5 local oscillator (0=A,1=B)
Receiver channel H5 (0=off,1=on)
FDM motor current trip status(0=enabled,1=disabled)
RDM motor current trip status(0=enabled,1=disabled)
FDM motor supply (0=off, 1=on)
RDM motor supply (0=off, 1=on)
FDM motor sensors selected (0=A, 1=B)
RDM motor sensors selected (0=A, 1=B)
FDM zero position sensors (0=A, 1=B)
RDM zero position sensors (0=A, 1=B)

bit.name: DC Offset Valid
bit.description: 1 when all channels calibration targets are within acceptable limits

bit.name: Scan Control Valid-
bit.description: 1 if all mid pixel positions of the reflector during Earth, Space OBCT views are within the limits for the Scan Mode profile

bit.name: Profile
bit.description: 00: Profile 0 (nominal scan mode profile with nominal space view position), 01: Profile 1 (alternate space view position 1) , 10: Profile 2 (alternate space view position 2), 11: No Profile calculated (profile will be manually loaded and modified)

bit.name: Channel H5 validity
bit.description: Channel H5 validity (set to 1 when all samples of the channel for this scan revolution lie within the ADC dynamic range)

bit.name: SPE Mux Code
bit.description: 000 Channel H1 to SPE 6, 001 Channel H2 to SPE 6, 010 Channel H3 to SPE 6, 011 SPE 6 not used, 100 Channel H4 to SPE 6, 101 Channel H5 to SPE 6, 110 and 111: SPE 6 not used

bit.name: Not used
bit.description: Not used

bit.name: secondary calibration
bit.description: Set if secondary calibration used

bit.name: glint correction
bit.description: Moon glint correction done

bit.name: Not used
bit.description: Not used

bit.name: calibration problems
bit.description: If bit n set to 1, then counts in channel n are physically unreasonable

bit.name: channels missing
bit.description: Set if all channels are missing

field.description: Earth view position validity flags (see MDR-1A)

field.name: SPACE_VIEW_POSITION_FLAG
field.description: Space view position validity flags (see MDR-1A)

field.name: OBCT_VIEW_POSITION_FLAG
field.description: Internal calibration target view position validity flag (see MDR-1A)

field.name: PRT1_TEMPERATURE
field.description: bit 0-3 : 0 (unused) bit 4-15: On Board Target Temperature 1 (PRT1)

field.name: PRT2_TEMPERATURE
field.description: bit 0-3 : 0 (unused) bit 4-15: On Board Target Temperature 2 (PRT2)

field.name: PRT3_TEMPERATURE
field.description: bit 0-3 : 0 (unused) bit 4-15: On Board Target Temperature 3 (PRT3)

field.name: PRT4_TEMPERATURE
field.description: bit 0-3 : 0 (unused) bit 4-15: On Board Target Temperature 4 (PRT4)

field.name: PRT5_TEMPERATURE
field.description: bit 0-3 : 0 (unused) bit 4-15: On Board Target Temperature 5 (PRT5)

field.name: RESISTANCE_SLOPE
field.description: Slope m of the resistance equation

field.name: RESISTANCE_OFFSET
field.description: Offset Roff of the resistance equation

field.name: MAIN_BUS
field.description: Main bus select (indicates which main bus is used by MHS); 1 (0V)=A bus (relay closed), 0 (5V)=B bus (relay opened)
Survival temperatures; Word 1: Receiver temperature, Word 2: Electronics equipment temperature, Word 3: Scan mechanism temperature

Transmitter telemetry (zero filled for Metop); Word 1: STX-1 status, Word 2: STX-2 status, Word 3: STX-3 status, Word 4: STX-4 status, Word 5: STX-1 power, Word 6: STX-2 power, Word 7: STX-3 power, Word 8: SARR-A power, Word 9: SARR-B power

bit.description: Do not use scan line for product generation
Time sequence error detected for this scan
Data gap precedes this scan
No calibration
No Earth location
First good time following a clock update
Instrument status changed within this scan

bit.name: Not used
bit.description: Not used

delimiter.name: Time Problem Code (all bits off implies the scan time is as expected)

bit.description: Not used
time field is bad but can probably be inferred from the previous good time
time field is bad and can't be inferred from the previous good time

this record starts a sequence that is inconsistent with previous times (i.e., there is a time discontinuity). This may or may not be associated with a spacecraft clock update (See bit 26 in QUALITY_INDICATOR Field)
start of a sequence that apparently repeats scan times that have been previously accepted
Not used
Scan line contains one or more space view that are lunar contaminated
Lunar-contaminated scan line was able to be calibrated (only applicable if the previous flag [bit 17] is 1; otherwise, zero)

delimiter.name: Calibration Code Problem (Note these bits complement the channel indicators; all bits set to 0 indicates normal calibration. )

bit.description: Scan line was not calibrated because of bad time
Scan line was calibrated using fewer than the preferred number of scan lines because of proximity to start or end of data set or to a data gap
Scan line was not calibrated because of bad or insufficient PRT data
Scan line was calibrated but with marginal PRT data
Some uncalibrated channels on this scan. (See channel indicators.)
Uncalibrated due to instrument mode.
Questionable calibration because of antenna position error of space view
Questionable calibration because of antenna position error of black body view

delimiter.name: Earth Location Problem Code (all bits off indicates the Earth location was normal)

bit.description: Not earth located because of bad time; earth location fields zero filled
Earth location questionable because of questionable time code. (See time problem flags above.)
Earth location questionable - only marginal agreement with reasonableness check.
Earth location questionable - fails reasonableness check
Earth location questionable because of antenna position check
Not used

bit.name: Not used
bit.description: Not used

bit.name: anomalous
bit.description: This scan line is either the last one before or the first one after a sudden, anomalous jump (or drop) in calibration counts

bit.name: bad blackbody
bit.description: No good blackbody counts for scanline

bit.name: bad space view
bit.description: No good space view counts for scan line

bit.name: bad PRT
bit.description: No good PRTs for this scanline

bit.name: some bad blackbody
bit.description: Some bad blackbody view counts for this scan line

bit.name: some bad space view
bit.description: Some bad space view counts for this scan line

bit.name: some bad PRT
bit.description: Some bad PRT temps on this scan line

field.description: Primary Calibration Second Order Term a2 (H1-H5)
Primary Calibration First Order Term a1(H1-H5)
Primary Calibration Zeroth Order Term a0 (H1-H5)
Secondary Calibration Second Order Term a2 (H1-H5)
Secondary Calibration First Order Term a1 (H1-H5)
Secondary Calibration Zeroth Order Term a0 (H1-H5)

bit.name: Not used
bit.description: Not used

bit.name: Earth location corrected for Euler angles
Earth location indicator
bit.description: 0 = earth location available, 1 = user ephemeris files older than 24 hours, 2 = no earth location available

bit.name: Spacecraft attitude control
bit.description: 0 = operating in YGC or NOMINAL mode, 1 = operating in another mode, 2 = attitude exceeds nominal tolerance, 3 = both 1 and 2

bit.name: Attitude SMODE
bit.description: 0 = NOMINAL mode, 1 = rate nulling mode, 2 = YGC mode, 3 = search mode, 4 = coast mode

bit.name: Attitude mode
bit.description: 0 = NOMINAL mode/no test, 1 = yaw axis test in progress, 2 = roll axis test in progress, 3 = pitch axis test in progress

field.description: Angular relationships: solar zenith angle, satellite zenith angle, solar azimuth angle, satellite azimuth angle - (points 1 to 90)
Surface property (0 = water, 1 = mixed/coast, 2 = land) (point 1 to 90)
Angles between moon and individual space views (between 0 and 180 degrees, one word for each of the four space views)
